content:
Hi Stranger, welcome to my echo chamber.
Here I will periodically dump my observations/experiences of various topics, not necessarily limited to tech.
Hopefully, it will be a mutually beneficial use of our limited time and helps to further expand our ever-growing knowledge.

title: A place for my head

content:
Hi Stranger, welcome to my echo chamber.
I am Abhishek, more commonly known as stark in online communities.
Professionally I am a Linux system engineer with a wide variety of interests.
In my free time, I like to tinker with microcontrollers/electronics, practice guitar riffs, learn languages.
